name: A New Job
description:
A New Job is a game where you have to follow an adventurer and help him during his quest.

This game was made with LÖVE, during the 72h LÖVE Jam. The theme was Companion.

I did the programming and art. Sounds generated using bfxr, musics generated using WolframTones.

Controls
Use the arrow keys to move you character.

Special thanks
To 1e0, he was kind enough to start creating games with me, motivation++
